complaint.description: I have moved from MTN for the better rates, but especially to get away from the MTN Spam Sms’s!!! I am not even on the MTN network, yet they feel free to inundate me with thier Y’ello spam bot bull. Please remove me from your adverti*****ts and spam immediately!
complaint.suggestion: Take immediate action to remove the customer from the spam list and ensure they do not receive any further spam messages.

meta.review_content:
I have moved from MTN for the better rates, but especially to get away from the MTN Spam Sms’s!!!

I am not even on the MTN network, yet they feel free to inundate me with thier Y’ello spam bot bull.
